com.solvvy.features

Interface ClusterFeaturizerFunction<T extends Scoreable<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of elements that will be featurized by the Featurizer returned by the application of this function.
    All Superinterfaces:
    TriFunction<java.util.function.IntFunction<Optional<String>>,VectorCluster<T>,Integer,Featurizer<ClusteredFeatureVector<T>>>

    public interface ClusterFeaturizerFunction<T extends Scoreable<T>>
extends TriFunction<java.util.function.IntFunction<Optional<String>>,VectorCluster<T>,Integer,Featurizer<ClusteredFeatureVector<T>>>
    A function of three arguments that returns a Featurizer to be used in generating stage2 features of a ClusteredFeatureVector for a single cluster. In Haskell pseudo-notation, the function is something like (int -> Maybe String) -> VectorCluster -> int -> Featurizer

    The arguments are:

    1. A function that returns the name of a feature given the index of that feature in a feature vector.
    2. a VectorCluster containing the set of clustered elements and their centroid
    3. An int representing the maximum cluster size of all clusters produced by the clustering that resulted in the cluster for which this function produces a Featurizer

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.solvvy.util.functions.TriFunction

        apply
